text: neohuiga jeonlipum-eul hoegdeughalyeo tteonal ttae dwie nam-a iss-eossdeon wiseonja deul-eun jeohuilo hayeogeum yeoleobun-eul tta lagadolog heolaghayeo jusoseo lago malhadeola sillo geudeul-eun hananim-ui malsseum-eul byeongyeonghalyeo wonhadoda illeo galodoe neohuineun gyeolko ulileul ttaleul su eobsnani imi hananimkkeseo malsseum hasyeossnola hani geudeul-eun geuleohji a niham-ila neohuiga ulileul jiltuhal ppun-ilago malhani sillo geudeul-eun i haehaji moshadeola
